WorkItem.ClosedComment: the grammar is just a demo, will fix it in the future
WorkItem.Description: Currently, the compilation_unit grammar element currently uses namespace_declarations_opt, where it should use namespace_member_declarations, as per ECMA-334, section 16 subsection 1.  As such, it does not support defining types in the global namespace.
WorkItem.Summary: Sample CSharpGrammar incorrectly implements the compilation-unit element

Comments.Message: well, it was done to remove one of many conflicts - I guess, or as far as I can recall. Remember, it is just a sample, don't take it too seriously -))
